# samsungcloudplatformv2_vpc_transit_gateway (Data Source)

Show Transit Gateway

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_vpc_transit_gateway" "vpctransitgateway" {
  id = var.id
}


output "vpctransitgateway" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_vpc_transit_gateway.vpctransitgateway
}



variable "id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```
